Name: Light color range
Description: The compound value that holds a lighthouse's beam of light color (typically White, Red, or Green) along with the colored light beams' corresponding range.

Properties.Name: Color
Properties.Description: The color of the light beam. (Typically White, Red, or Green. Note: some lighthouses emit all 3 colors in different sector areas)

Properties.Name: Light range
Properties.Description: The distance that the light beam can be seen from.
